# Background

# Initial feelings upon offer

My very first feelings were excitement at the offer. pushed it off for final decision making until the end of the week.

Shortly, overwhelmed by oscillating feelings of excitement for the opportunity and stress at the upcoming decisions we have to make. Realizing I am very ill-equipped to deal with the decision making and the emotions behind it.

It's my life, it is now or never

How can I let myself enjoy the fact that I have be extended an offer for at least a moment before spiraling into a nervous wreck over the difficult calculus we need to do before we make
